ffff050t You Have Given a Match to a Child Who Lives in a Tinderbox!
Rarity: Super Rare
Inventory options for this figure are controlled by the main/parent unit.
You Have Given a Match to a Child Who Lives in a Tinderbox!
If exactly one friendly character named Mr. Fantastic is on your starting force, he starts the game with the FFFF #s005 Ultimate Nullifier equipped.
5 Points
